content: **knitted drops hat and neck warmer with spiral pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-501 yarn group e or c + c ----------------------------------------------------------- **hat** size one-size head circumference approx 54/58 cm / 21 1/4 /22 3/4 materials drops snow from garnstudio 100 g color no 47 light beige drops double pointed needles size 8 mm / us 11 - or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm ** pattern for the whirlwind cowl can be found here 1 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/157-38-whirlwind-cowl
